sentences.english: According to party rules, they could have fought a further round.
sentences.chinese: 尽管根据党章他们可以进行更深一轮的竞争。

sentences.english: Second, we have adapted the new Party Constitution.
The entire document is designed to support the 2008 Constitution.
sentences.chinese: 整个党章立足于维护2008年宪法。

sentences.english: The Party's New Constitution is the great creed for the new century.
sentences.chinese: 新党章是新世纪新阶段与时俱进的伟大纲领。

sentences.english: The Party Congress also adopted the new Party Constitution.
sentences.chinese: 党的代表大会还通过了新党章。

sentences.english: The fundamental ones are embodied in the Party Constitution.
sentences.chinese: 党章是最根本的党规党法。

definition: Deng Xiaoping Theory/Dengism/the foundation of PRC economic development after the Cultural Revolution, building the capitalist economy within Chinese Communist Party control
the spirit or character of a political party
Manifesto of the Communist Party/"Manifest der Kommunistischen Partei" by Marx and Engels (1848)

the Three Represents enunciated by Jiang Zemin 江澤民|江泽民 as the duty of the Chinese Communist party in 2001, namely: to represent productivity of an advanced society, forward progress of advanced culture and the fundamental interests of the people

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 te4 se4 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4
Ma3 ke4 si1 Lie4 ning2 zhu3 yi4

definition: Selected Works of Mao Zedong/abbr. for 毛澤東選集|毛泽东选集[Mao2 Ze2 dong1 Xuan3 ji2]
